description:
Navigate to the website and login using following credentials:
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

On the home page, verify the following:
1. banner image loads correctly.
2. "Just In" section displays 4 products
3. Category callouts are present: Clothes, Shoes, Accessories
4. Verify "Offers" section is displayed.
5. Verify that all navigation links in the header work correctly.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL: http://localhost:3005
Enter the username 'test_user_name' and password 'test_password' in the login fields
Click on the login button to log into the website
Verify that the banner image loads correctly on the home page
Verify that the 'Just In' section displays exactly 4 products
Verify that category callouts for 'Clothes', 'Shoes', and 'Accessories' are present on the home page
Verify that the 'Offers' section is displayed on the home page
Verify that all navigation links in the header work correctly by clicking each link and confirming the corresponding page loads
Take a screenshot of the completed home page test results

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Login and verify home page sections

description:
Navigate to the website and use the following credentials to login.
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Navigate to shoes sub-menu.

Then click on "The Store" home logo and verify that user cames back to the home page.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to URL: http://localhost:3005
Enter the username 'test_user_name' and password 'test_password' in the login form.
Click the login button to sign in.
Navigate to the shoes sub-menu by clicking on the shoes section.
Click on 'The Store' home logo to navigate back to the home page.
Verify that the current URL is 'http://localhost:3005' to confirm navigation back to the home page.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Login, navigate shoes submenu, and return home

description:
Login to the websiste using the following credentialss
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Make sure the homepage loads, and user is able to click on "cart" and see an empty cart.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL: http://localhost:3005
Enter username 'test_user_name' and password 'test_password' in the login form, and click login.
Verify that the homepage loads by checking for expected content on the home page
Locate the 'cart' icon or link and click it to navigate to the cart view
Verify that the cart is empty by checking for an empty cart message or a lack of items

description:
Login to the websiste using the following credentialss
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Go to shoes category, and use the following filters:
Black shoes for Men with max prices upto $100.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL: http://localhost:3005
Enter username 'test_user_name' and password 'test_password' in the login form.
Click the login button to submit the credentials and wait for the home page to load.
Navigate to the 'Shoes' category page by clicking on the Shoes link on the homepage.
Verify that the Shoes category page loads correctly.
In the filter sidebar, select the 'Men' filter under the Department or Gender section.
In the filter sidebar, select the 'Black' filter under the Color section (may have to click on the color section to expand)
In the filter sidebar, set the Maximum Price filter to 100. (may have to click on max price section to expand)
Wait for the filtered results to update and verify that the first product meets the filter criteria
Take a screenshot of the filtered shoes products page to confirm successful filtering.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Login and apply filters on shoes products
